title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - AJ and Usyk meet face-to-face
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - AJ and Usyk meet face-to-face
description:
Joining Mannix this week is Sergio Mora, former junior middleweight champion and DAZN broadcaster. Mannix and Mora discuss Artur Beterbiev's win over Joe Smith, a potential Beterbiev-Dmitry Bivol fight, Bam Rodriguez's latest challenge, AJ-Usyk meet face-to-face, Jake Paul-Tommy Fury, and more; later, Bam Rodriguez on beating Carlos Cuadras, facing Srisaket Sor Rungvisai and what would happen if his brother, 115-pound contender Joshua Franco, becomes the mandatory challenger for his belt. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
